org.threadly.litesockets

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.threadly.litesockets.Server
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TCPServer, UDPServer

    public abstract class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main Server Interface for litesockets.

    Any type of connection/open port will use this to "Accept" new client connections on. The Server has an Acceptor callback for new clients and a Closer callback for clean up when the socket is closed.

    Both the Server.ClientAcceptor and Server.ServerCloseListener callbacks can happen on multiple threads so use thread safety when dealing with those callbacks.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Server.ClientAcceptor
      Used to notify the when a new Client has been created for a Server
      static interface  Server.ServerCloseListener
      Used to notify when a Server connection is closed.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        public abstract void close()

        Close this servers Socket. Once closed you must construct a new Server to open it again.

      • getServerType

        public abstract WireProtocol getServerType()

        This is used by the SocketExecuter to know how to handle this Server when its added to it. Currently only UDP or TCP.

        Returns:
        returns the type of protocol this socket uses.

      • start

        public void start()
        Tells the Server to start accepting connections.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Tells the Server to stop accepting connections. The Listen port is still open and you can call start() to start listening again. Use close() to close the Listen port.

      • getSocketExecuter

        public SocketExecuter getSocketExecuter()

        Gets the Current SocketExecuter this Server is assigned to.

        Returns:
        the current SocketExecuter for this Server.

      • addCloseListener

        public void addCloseListener(Server.ServerCloseListener listener)

        Adds a Server.ServerCloseListener for this Server.

        Parameters:
        listener - The Server.ServerCloseListener to set for this Server.

      • getClientAcceptor

        public Server.ClientAcceptor getClientAcceptor()

        Gets the current Server.ClientAcceptor Callback for this Server.

        Returns:
        the currently set Server.ClientAcceptor.

      • setClientAcceptor

        public void setClientAcceptor(Server.ClientAcceptor acceptor)

        Set the Server.ClientAcceptor for this Server. This should be set before the Server is added to the SocketExecuter. If its not you could miss pending client connections.

        Parameters:
        acceptor - Sets the Server.ClientAcceptor callback for this server.

      • isClosed

        public boolean isClosed()
        Tells you if this sever objects Listen port is still open or not.
        Returns:
        true if the socket is closed, false if the socket is open.
